rdf:Description.dc:title: Farthest North
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Fridtjof Nansen (1861–1930)
Otto Neumann Sverdrup (1854–1930)
rdf:Description.dc:rights:
This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org. This eBook is produced by Jeroen Hellingman and the Online Distributed Proofreading Team at www.pgdp.net. This is volume one, volume two is available at Project Gutenberg as ebook number 34120. Prepared from scans made of a copy in my collection. A number of scan-sets are available on-line:
UK Edition, 1897, Westminster: A. Constable, Vol 1, Vol 2.US Edition, 1897, New York, Harper & brothers, Vol 1, Vol 2.US Edition, 1898, One volume edition.
The Norwegian original is also available on line: Fram over polhavet: den norske polarfærd 1893–1896 (1897): Vol 1. (New York Public Library) 1897 (TIA Copy) Vol 2. (New York Public Library) 1897 (TIA Copy). The scientific results of this expedition in six volumes are also partly available as scans, and can be located by searching Archive.org.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Arctic regions
Fram Expedition
